title: Alex Dowsett aims for Hour Record on custom Factor Hanzo with Silca prototype ti track dropouts
content:
British pro cyclist Alex Dowsett is Mexico this week riding a customized Factor Hanzo time trial bike converted for the track in an attempt at the prized Hour Record, reclaiming it in fact. Aiming for at least 55.09km in 60 minutes on the sameÂ Aguascalientes velodrome where Victor Campenaerts set the current record 2.5 years ago

The post Alex Dowsett aims for Hour Record on custom Factor Hanzo with Silca prototype ti track dropouts appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
